definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ge 31:48 heap, wave, billow (as rolled together, rolling, rolling up), also

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: [[אבנים]] ´[[ג]] raised ([[הקים]]) over dead body Jos 7:26, Jos 8:29; cf. 2Sa 18:17 (c. [[הִצִּיב]]).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: heap or pile made ([[עשׂה]]) for use in ratifying compact of Jacob with Laban Ge 31:46, Ge 31:46, Ge 31:48, Ge 31:51, Ge 38:52, Ge 31:52, Ge 31:52 cf. also [[גַּלְעֵד]]

definitions.title: n.pr. d.
definitions.body: heap of ruins Is 25:2; elsewhere pl. Ho 12:12, 2Ki 19:25 = Is 37:26, Job 15:28, Je 9:10, Je 51:37.

waves (rollers) poet., only pl., waves of sea Je 5:22, Je 31:35, Is 51:15, Job 38:11, Ps 65:8, Ps 89:10, Ps 107:25, Ps 107:29; cf. also in simile Ez Eze 26:3, Is 48:18 ([[גַּלֵּי־הַיׇּם]]); fig. of chastisements from ´[[י]] Ps 42:8 (‖[[מִשְׁבָּרִים]]) Jon 2:3 (‖ id.); of army of Babylon's conqueror Je 51:42, Je 51:55; cf. Zec 10:11 (VB; but Bev:JPh xviii. 88 prop. [[גִּבְלִים]] cf. Ez Eze 27:9).

spring, Ct So 4:12 [[גַּן נׇעוּל אֲחוֹתִי כַּלָָּה גַּל נׇעוּל מַעְיׇן חָתוּם]] a garden barred (is) my sister, bride, a spring barred, a fountain sealed; but [[גַּן]] for [[גַּל]] LXX SyrVer Vulgate.
